channel.title: Philip's Notebook
channel.description: Online residence of Philip C Davis

item.title: Beginning Again
item.description:
I needed to redo my website for a lot of reasons. The most important being speed. My previous website was awfully slow. There were lots of reasons why that was, the most important being lots of huge uncompressed images. There is still work to be done, but already the speed index has gone from 9295 to 634. Still working on making the reading experience optimal. If you notice anything funky, let me know.

Feedback

If you have any, I would love to hear from you.
